heading: Program Educational Objectives & Program Specific Outcomes
description: Comprehensive framework defining the educational goals and specialized outcomes for BCA graduates.

sections.title: Program Educational Objectives (PEOs)
sections.description: Program Educational Objectives define the expected accomplishments of BCA graduates during the first few years after graduation.

items.title: Professional Excellence
items.description: Graduates will have successful careers in IT industry, academia, or as entrepreneurs, demonstrating technical competence and professional ethics.

items.title: Problem Solving Skills
items.description: Graduates will be able to analyze complex IT problems and develop innovative solutions using appropriate technologies and methodologies.

items.title: Continuous Learning
items.description: Graduates will engage in lifelong learning to adapt to emerging technologies and advance their careers through higher education or professional development.

items.title: Leadership & Teamwork
items.description: Graduates will function effectively in teams, demonstrate leadership qualities, and communicate effectively with diverse stakeholders.

sections.title: Program Specific Outcomes (PSOs)
sections.description: Program Specific Outcomes articulate what students should be able to do specifically in Computer Applications.

items.title: Programming & Development
items.description: Ability to analyze, design, develop, test, and maintain software applications using modern programming languages and frameworks.

items.title: Database Management
items.description: Proficiency in designing, implementing, and managing databases to store, retrieve, and manipulate data efficiently.

items.title: Web & Mobile Technologies
items.description: Competence in developing responsive web applications and mobile applications using contemporary technologies and frameworks.

items.title: System Administration
items.description: Understanding of operating systems, computer networks, and ability to manage IT infrastructure and ensure system security.

items.title: Problem Analysis
items.description: Ability to apply computational thinking and algorithmic approach to analyze and solve real-world problems efficiently.
